text.section: The Department is the unit of State government that coordinates public access to the Chesapeake Bay and its tributaries.

section.section: This section may not be construed to expand the authority that the Department has on July 1, 1988 to require or promote condemnation of real property along the Big Blackwater River and the Little Blackwater River.

The State may not acquire by eminent domain real property along the Big Blackwater River or the Little Blackwater River without first proving that the acquisition is necessary to preserve the natural qualities and unpolluted state of the Big Blackwater River and the Little Blackwater River.
